# UrbanKicks

> Full-stack MERN e-commerce application for shoe shopping

## What is this?
UrbanKicks is an online shoe store built with the MERN stack that allows users to:
- Browse and search shoe collections
- Create accounts and authenticate
- Add items to shopping cart
- Place and track orders
- Write product reviews

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React 18, Material-UI, TailwindCSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js
- Database: MongoDB with Mongoose
- Authentication: JWT with bcrypt

## Features
- User registration and authentication
- Product catalog with categories
- Shopping cart functionality
- Order placement and history
- Product reviews and ratings
- Responsive design

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Express.js API server
- `/frontend` - React application (CRA)

## API Endpoints
- `/users` - Authentication and user management
- `/products` - Product CRUD operations
- `/cart` - Shopping cart management
- `/orders` - Order processing
- `/reviews` - Product reviews

## Development
```bash
# Backend
cd backend && npm install && npm start

# Frontend
cd frontend && npm install && npm start
```

## Repository
https://github.com/Priyans-hu/urbankicks
